column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was riding my new bicycle when I stumbled over a rock or something .
#id=2
#text=The tire seemed to explode upon impact .
#id=3
#text=I struggled to stay atop the bicycle but was fortunately able to keep my balance .
#id=4
#text=I knew that I had to fix my tire in order to use the bike .
#id=5
#text=I knew the local gas station was only a few blocks away so I decided to walk my bike there .
#id=6
#text=The first thing I did was get something to tape up the hole .
#id=7
#text=The manager gave me some sort of sticky resin in order to patch things up .
#id=8
#text=I went to the air pump to put some air into the tire and once it was full I was ready to patch it up .
#id=9
#text=I used the resin to cover the hole and the tire seemed as good as new .
#text=I rode the bike home and made sure to avoid rolling over anymore rocks .
